code_quality.title: Reduce Excessive 'Any' Type Usage in Python
code_quality.description: Replace generic 'Any' type hints with specific Pydantic models or TypedDicts across the integration-service and core services.
code_quality.rationale: Stronger typing catches bugs during development and improves code maintainability and IDE support.

code_quality.title: Split Large Integration Adapter Files
code_quality.description: Refactor adapter files (Jira, ServiceNow) that exceed 1000 lines into smaller, domain-focused modules.
code_quality.rationale: Large files violate the Single Responsibility Principle and increase cognitive load during development and review.

code_quality.title: Standardize Python Formatting with Black and Ruff
code_quality.description: Enforce consistent formatting and linting rules across all Python services in the monorepo using a shared config.
code_quality.rationale: Consistency in code style improves readability and reduces merge conflicts in a multi-language monorepo.
